TITLE: Installing prompt-kit components with shadcn CLI DESCRIPTION: Command to install prompt-kit components after setting up shadcn/ui in your project. The command uses the shadcn CLI to add specific components from prompt-kit. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npx shadcn@latest add prompt-kit/[component] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing prompt-kit Components Using shadcn CLI DESCRIPTION: This command uses the shadcn CLI to add a prompt-kit component to your project. Replace [COMPONENT] with the specific component name you want to install. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/installation/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn@latest add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/[COMPONENT].json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing prompt-kit components in React DESCRIPTION: Example of how to import a prompt-kit component (PromptInput) in a React component after installation. This demonstrates the usage pattern for prompt-kit components in your project. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ``` import { PromptInput } from "@/components/ui/prompt-input" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing prompt-kit Component in React DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to import a prompt-kit component (PromptInput) in a React component or file. Adjust the import path as needed based on your project structure. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/installation/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ``` import { PromptInput } from "@/components/ui/prompt-input"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Integrating ChatContainer with ScrollButton in React DESCRIPTION: Example of how to use the ChatContainer component in conjunction with a ScrollButton component to create a complete chat interface. This snippet demonstrates setting up refs and positioning the scroll button. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/chat-container/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ``` import { useRef } from "react" import { ChatContainer } from "@/components/prompt-kit/chat-container" import { ScrollButton } from "@/components/prompt-kit/scroll-button" function ChatInterface() { const containerRef = useRef(null) const bottomRef = useRef(null) return (
{/* Your chat messages here */}
) } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Code Block with Markdown in React DESCRIPTION: This example demonstrates how to use the Code Block component within a Markdown component in a React application. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/code-block/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ``` import { Markdown } from "@/components/prompt-kit/markdown" function MyComponent() { const markdownContent = ` # Example \`\`\`javascript function greet(name) { return \`Hello, \${name}!\`; } \`\`\` return {markdownContent} }` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Markdown Component Rendering DESCRIPTION: Example of customizing how different Markdown elements are rendered using the components prop. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/markdown/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ``` const customComponents = { h1: ({ children }) =>

{children}

, a: ({ href, children }) => {children}, // ... other components } {markdownContent} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Markdown Component with Tailwind Typography DESCRIPTION: Example of using the Markdown component with Tailwind Typography classes for improved styling. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/markdown/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ``` {markdownContent} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Markdown Component with Unique ID DESCRIPTION: Example of using the Markdown component with a unique ID for proper block caching in AI chat interfaces. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/markdown/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ``` {message.content} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Streaming JSX Preview Component in React DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to use the ComponentCodePreview to render a streaming JSX Preview example with additional props. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/jsx-preview/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` } filePath="app/docs/jsx-preview/jsx-preview-streaming.tsx" classNameComponentContainer="p-8" hasReTrigger /> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Basic JSX Preview Component in React DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to use the ComponentCodePreview to render a basic JSX Preview example. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/jsx-preview/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` } filePath="app/docs/jsx-preview/jsx-preview-basic.tsx" classNameComponentContainer="p-8" /> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Code Block with Tailwind Typography in React DESCRIPTION: This example shows how to use the Code Block component within an article styled with Tailwind Typography, demonstrating the use of the 'not-prose' class. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/code-block/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ```

My Content

This content has prose styling applied.

{/* The CodeBlock has not-prose to prevent prose styling */}
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Handling Code Blocks with Tailwind Typography DESCRIPTION: Example of using the not-prose class to exclude elements from prose styling when using Tailwind Typography. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/markdown/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: tsx CODE: ```

My Content

Regular content with prose styling...

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing File Upload Components in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to import the necessary components for the File Upload feature, including a custom component and a code preview component. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/prompt-input/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import ComponentCodePreview from "@/components/app/component-code-preview" import { PromptInputBasic } from "./prompt-input-basic" import { PromptInputWithActions } from "./prompt-input-with-actions" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Message Components DESCRIPTION: Import statements for the message component and its variants. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/message/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import ComponentCodePreview from "@/components/app/component-code-preview" import { MessageBasic } from "./message-basic" import { MessageWithActions } from "./message-with-actions" import { MessageWithMarkdown } from "./message-with-markdown" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Code Block Components in React DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the import statements for various code block components used in the documentation. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/code-block/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import ComponentCodePreview from "@/components/app/component-code-preview" import { CodeBlockBasic } from "./code-block-basic" import { CodeBlockCSS } from "./code-block-css" import { CodeBlockNord } from "./code-block-nord" import { CodeBlockPython } from "./code-block-python" import { CodeBlockThemed } from "./code-block-themed" import { CodeBlockWithHeader } from "./code-block-with-header" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Loader Components in React DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to import various Loader components and a code preview component in a React application. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/loader/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import ComponentCodePreview from "@/components/app/component-code-preview" import { LoaderBasic } from "./loader-basic" import { LoaderSizes } from "./loader-sizes" import { LoaderWithText } from "./loader-with-text" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Prompt Suggestion Components DESCRIPTION: TypeScript imports for the Prompt Suggestion component and its variants SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/prompt-suggestion/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import ComponentCodePreview from "@/components/app/component-code-preview" import { PromptSuggestionBasic } from "./prompt-suggestion-basic" import { PromptSuggestionHighlight } from "./prompt-suggestion-highlight" import { PromptSuggestionVariants } from "./prompt-suggestion-variants" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Reasoning Component Dependencies DESCRIPTION: TypeScript imports for the Reasoning component and its variants. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/reasoning/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import ComponentCodePreview from "@/components/app/component-code-preview" import { ReasoningBasic } from "./reasoning-basic" import { ReasoningControlled } from "./reasoning-controlled" import { ReasoningWithAIResponse } from "./reasoning-with-ai-response" import { ReasoningWithCustomStyling } from "./reasoning-with-custom-styling" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing JSX Preview Components in React DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows the import statements for the JSX Preview components and examples. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/jsx-preview/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import ComponentCodePreview from "@/components/app/component-code-preview" import { JSXPreviewBasic } from "./jsx-preview-basic" import { JSXPreviewStreaming } from "./jsx-preview-streaming" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Markdown Component via CLI DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Markdown component using the project's CLI tool. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/markdown/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/markdown.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Chat Container Component via CLI DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Chat Container component using the project's CLI tool. This method simplifies the installation process by automatically adding the component to your project. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/chat-container/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/chat-container.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing ResponseStream Component via CLI DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Response Stream component into a project using the shadcn CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/response-stream/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/response-stream.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Code Block Component via CLI DESCRIPTION: This bash command installs the Code Block component using the provided CLI command. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/code-block/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/code-block.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing JSX Preview Component via CLI DESCRIPTION: This bash command installs the JSX Preview component using the shadcn CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/jsx-preview/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/jsx-preview.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Prompt Suggestion Component via CLI DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Prompt Suggestion component using the shadcn CLI SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/prompt-suggestion/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/prompt-suggestion.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Scroll Button via CLI DESCRIPTION: Command to install the scroll button component using the CLI tool. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/scroll-button/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/scroll-button.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing File Upload Component via CLI DESCRIPTION: This command uses npx to add the File Upload component to a project using the shadcn CLI tool. It fetches the component configuration from a specified URL. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/file-upload/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/file-upload.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Prompt Input Component via CLI DESCRIPTION: This bash command installs the Prompt Input component using the shadcn CLI tool. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/prompt-input/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/prompt-input.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Message Component via CLI DESCRIPTION: Command to install the message component using the shadcn CLI tool. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/message/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/message.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Reasoning Component via CLI DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Reasoning component using the shadcn CLI tool. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/reasoning/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/reasoning.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Loader Component via CLI DESCRIPTION: This command installs the Loader component using the shadcn CLI tool. It fetches the component configuration from a specified URL. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/loader/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx shadcn add "https://prompt-kit.com/c/loader.json" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Markdown Component Dependencies DESCRIPTION: Command to install required dependencies for the Markdown component. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/markdown/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install react-markdown remark-gfm ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Required Dependencies for Code Block DESCRIPTION: This bash command installs the necessary dependencies for the Code Block component. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/code-block/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install shiki ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Tailwind Typography Plugin DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Tailwind Typography plugin for enhanced Markdown styling. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/markdown/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install -D @tailwindcss/typography ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Loader Animations in CSS DESCRIPTION: This CSS code defines various keyframe animations used by the Loader component, including typing, loading dots, wave, blink, and shimmer effects. SOURCE: https://github.com/ibelick/prompt-kit/blob/main/app/docs/loader/page.mdx#2025-04-18_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @keyframes typing { 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 0.5; } 50% { transform: translateY(-2px); opacity: 1; } } @keyframes loading-dots { 0%, 100% { opacity: 0; } 50% { opacity: 1; } } @keyframes wave { 0%, 100% { transform: scaleY(1); } 50% { transform: scaleY(0.6); } } @keyframes blink { 0%, 100% { opacity: 1; } 50% { opacity: 0; } } @keyframes text-blink { 0%, 100% { color: var(--primary); } 50% { color: var(--muted-foreground); } } @keyframes bounce-dots { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(0.8); opacity: 0.5; } 50% { transform: scale(1.2); opacity: 1; } } @keyframes thin-pulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(0.95); opacity: 0.8; } 50% { transform: scale(1.05); opacity: 0.4; } } @keyframes pulse-dot { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 0.8; } 50% { transform: scale(1.5); opacity: 1; } } @keyframes shimmer-text { 0% { background-position: 150% center; } 100% { background-position: -150% center; } } @keyframes wave-bars { 0%, 100% { transform: scaleY(1); opacity: 0.5; } 50% { transform: scaleY(0.6); opacity: 1; } } @keyframes shimmer { 0% { background-position: 200% 50%; } 100% { background-position: -200% 50%; } } @keyframes spinner-fade { 0% { opacity: 0; } 100% { opacity: 1; } } ```
